name: HomeService
0:
”Alexa, ask Home Service what is the wifi password.”
”Alexa, ask Home Service where are the cleaning supplies”
”Alexa, ask home service where the paper towels are”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home service
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Home Service is a service which facilitates communication between hosts/hotels and visitors, provides inside and local information about the area where guests are visiting, and functions as a friendly concierge to ensure that guests have a fun stay. When visiting a new vacation rental and area, guests often have lots of questions - things like where the TV remote is located, what the best local restaurants are, and how to operate the AC, heating system, dishwasher, etc. Cheat-sheets get lost easily and often, and may guests end up during directly to their host for help. Home Service automates the process of getting answers to these questions, and ensures that your guests are in-the-know at all times. 

For owners who manage multiple properties, it’s hard to keep track of who’s asking what, and keeping in touch with so many guests can take up quite a bit of time. Home Service can save you time and money by automating this question answering, and our first-of-its-kind authentication system allows you to scale as much as you’d like.

In order to take full advantage of Home Service, please head over to https://homeservice.ai to set up an account and create your first property! Once you've created a property, it takes less than a minute to connect it to your Alexa device.

To get started, go to https://www.homeservice.ai

https://www.facebook.com/virtualhomeservice/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
